Inline Printing and Coding Specialists

For more than 65 years, BELL-MARK has been creating cutting-edge solutions for package and carton printing applications in the medical device, pharmaceutical, meat, poultry, dairy, and prepared foods industries. BELL-MARK offers many in-line printing technologies including piezo inkjet, thermal inkjet, thermal transfer, flexographic, and ink coder, all of which satisfy requirements to print directly onto package and carton substrates.

REQUEST A QUOTE

Since 1964, Econocorp has been designing and manufacturing secondary packaging equipment that unlocks the power of automation for those who need flexibility in their operations. The company specializes in low- to moderate-speed cartoning, case packing, and tray forming solutions that range from simple to complex, including complete integrated systems. These solutions address the needs of various industries, including contract packaging, beverages, frozen foods, nutraceuticals, industrial goods, personal care, and more. Econocorp is a trusted packaging automation partner dedicated to providing the high level of support and service necessary for growth.

INNOVATION IN

Founded in 1976 by Francesca Fazzolari and Alexander Davidson, James Alexander Corporation is a growing, privately-owned firm that is recognized for its innovations in glass ampoule packaging and its development of a revolutionary single-use plastic ampoule delivery system for contract packaging applications.

Contract filling and
single-use packaging solutions

We specialize in contract filling services and single-use packaging solutions such as plastic ampoules, crushable glass ampoules, snap-top vials, unit dose swabs, DuoDispersion System®, inhalants and dropper tip assemblies.

Delivering quality, performance,
and customer service

We’re dedicated to maintaining strong and lasting business relationships with its customers. The company’s commitment to quality, performance and outstanding customer service coupled with a long-standing tradition of integrity are the values which define us.

SINGLE-USE
GLASS AMPOULE PACKAGES

All of the advantages that make glass the perfect package for many applications, including extending product shelf life, tamper resistance, sensitive formulations, or for two part systems.

PLASTIC AMPOULE PACKAGES

An innovative unit dose package designed to eliminate the inconvenience of having to tear or cut the top of the package in order to dispense the contents.

James Alexander offers stock medical inhalant and topical products including amyl nitrite, and ammonia inhalants, povidone iodine and Medicaine® topical solutions.

Pneumatic Scale Angelus | Who We Are

Pneumatic Scale Angelus is a global supplier of packaging machinery for wet and dry filling, capping, can seaming, labeling, and centrifugation applications.  Since 1895, our solutions have set the standard for filling and closing solutions in the Food, Beverage, Dairy, Pharmaceutical, and Household and Personal Care industries, and these solutions are fully supported by our global Service and Aftermarket network. In fact, every machine we've manufactured since our inception is still supported by the experts on our Field Service team.

As a trusted partner for our customers, each of our more than 700 team members worldwide are committed to helping you maintain the integrity of and realize your investment in the machines that keep your operations running.

Pneumatic Scale Angelus | Exceptional People. Superior Products. Worldwide Service.

Our Culture | Barry-Wehmiller

Pneumatic Scale Angelus is one of nine operating companies within the Barry-Wehmiller family, a form/fill/seal technologies & services leader across a broad spectrum of industries for more than 100 years.

With more than 12,000 team members spread among 100-plus locations around the globe, we remain united by a common belief: we can use the power of our business to build a better world.

READ MORE

40+ Locations Worldwide

Pneumatic Scale Angelus is part of BW Packaging. Through our five companies, customers can find more than just a single machine, they can leverage our combined primary packaging, labeling and end-of-line packaging systems capabilities. Find out more about how we can serve you.

BUILD YOUR FILLING SYSTEM 
American-made, High Quality Liquid Filling Equipment for the Global Manufacturing Market

Specialty Equipment Corporation is a Houston, Texas based manufacturer of high end packaging machinery and material handling systems, which includes; liquid filling machines, custom dry solids fillers, drum and pallet conveyors, and palletizers. We started in 1969 as a two-man job shop, and have since grown to become the leading manufacturer of American-made drum filling, pail filling, IBC/Tote filling, conveying and palletizing systems.

We offer services including, design, manufacturing, installation, start-up, and field service. Our reputation for building high quality, rugged equipment is well known and widely respected.

Productivity and Uptime is Critical
Since 1969, we have built our reputation on high quality, rugged liquid filling equipment and high-caliber service to:
Improve efficiency and production levels
Increase processing speeds and maximum uptime
Reduce labor, handling and maintenance

Filling and Weighing
Solutions Built for Accuracy

Improve uptime and increase production speed with filling solutions and checkweighers designed for your specific application. Spee-Dee® builds equipment with simplicity in mind, backed by a commitment to service and quality for the food, pharmaceutical and nutraceutical industries.

Choose Your Spee-Dee Solution
AUGER FILLERS

Spee-Dee’s auger fillers set the standard. Whether you’re hand-filling a container or you have a high-speed, high-torque application, our fillers improve hygiene and safety while reducing overfills to save costs.

LEARN MORE
VOLUMETRIC FILLERS

Spee-Dee's volumetric fillers are designed for fast cup size changeovers to optimize productivity. The simple drive system and minimal number of parts make them a durable, low-maintenance option.

LEARN MORE
ROTARY FILLERS

Spee-Dee’s rotary filling machines quickly, safely and cleanly fill dry products into rigid containers of many sizes, shapes and types and integrate easily with auger or cup fillers and high-speed combination weighers.

LEARN MORE
CHECKWEIGHERS

Spee-Dee’s PLC-based checkweighers check powder and gummy container weights at high speeds, helping to reduce costly product loss and ensure accurate fills.

LEARN MORE

The No Nonsense,
Single Serve Experts

We are your go-to, single-serve packaging partner.

When scaling your business needs to be done properly.

We take both a scientific and entrepreneurial approach to every project. By allowing us to guide you through the complexities of mass commercialization, we'll never be the limiting factor to your growth.

WHAT WE DOLET’S CHAT
So, Why
T.H.E.M.?

Short answer: we say what we do, and we do what we say. Our team is full of seasoned veterans and energetic young minds who deliver, what we believe to be, the Gold Standard within the contract packaging industry.

WHY US?
Stop scrolling, and get in touch.

We understand it may be easier to just talk through your ideas with a real human, and we’re game.

LET’S CHAT
Yeah, we can pack that!

Single-Serve package innovation for many of the world’s finest brands

T.H.E.M. introduced the stick pack to North America in 1996 the Stick Pack to North America and has been involved in more Stick Pack production than any other contract packager, but Stick Packs and stick packaging are only the beginning of T.H.E.M. single-serve format capabilities.

And we'll do it, fast.

In an industry where competitive advantage is fleeting, speed-to-market is everything. T.H.E.M. works with our customers early, and throughout the product development process to engineer solutions that meet their quality, innovation, and efficiency requirements, and get to the shelf in record time.

Bringing your products to market faster, regardless of your industry, is advantageous to any brand. T.H.E.M. can help you to take advantage of this opportunity to bring your products to market in high-quality packaging. There is no cost-cutting or sacrifice in quality when you partner with us. We work with global clients to give them the best innovative packaging for their products.

WE MAKE LIQUID AND PASTE PACKAGING EASY

“Taisei machines perform higher sustained speeds than competitor models. They are better and faster, and they increased my manufacturing efficiency.”

— A leading U.S. Manufacturer of foods. The company uses 3 Taisei Dangan Vertical Form Fill Machines for packing sweet sauces, fruit sauces, icings, savory sauces and gravies.
One-Stop Solution …

From the filler machinery to the flexible film, Taisei Lamick provides everything you need to package your liquid and paste products efficiently and in the highest-quality pouches on the market. Together, our machines and film provide our customers with the ability to:

Fill with high and low viscosity products as well as oils
Meet increased demand by speeding up production
Change over and set up quickly, eliminating costly downtime
Eliminate headspace for quality reasons, product requirements and material reduction
… from Fillers to Film

Our exclusive film technology, original sealant materials and custom lamination process uniquely respond to today’s diverse and complex demands, including production performance, usability, flexibility, economic efficiency, filling ability, sterilization conditions and more. While our auto fillers and films may be used independently, we recommend that they be used together. When integrated, our machines and films achieve the fastest processing speeds in the industry.

From Breidenbach into the world.
A successful family run company for more than 40 years.

On January 2nd, 1981, Günther Weber founded the company Weber Fleischereitechnik GmbH in Breidenbach, Germany. With innovative strength and know-how, we have been setting new standards in the development of line solutions in the cold cuts sector ever since. Tobias Weber, son of the founder, has been managing the company in the second generation since 2018.

WHO ARE WE?

Accurate Box Company is a certified woman-owned (WBENC) business and a fourth-generation family-owned manufacturer of custom litho-laminated corrugated boxes.

Accurate Box has a 400,000-square-foot facility and ships competitively throughout North America. We have the ability to print 7 colors plus a UV coating in a single pass on both small and large runs. All of Accurate Box’s boxes are 100% recyclable and printed with environmentally friendly inks.

Learn More
81 YEARS IN BUSINESS

Accurate Box Company is celebrating its 81st year in business. Currently woman-owned and run by Lisa Hirsh, granddaughter of the founder, Accurate Box is looking forward to continuing to grow as an independent family-owned company.

400,000 SQUARE FOOT FACILITY

Accurate Box has a 400,000-square-foot state-of-the-art facility that manufactures world class packaging in Paterson, New Jersey. Residing in a HUB/UEZ zone 15 miles from New York City, this location allows for competitive shipping rates throughout North America. Additionally, Accurate Box has many warehouse locations set up in the USA to allow for Just-In-Time inventory management.

100% RECYCLABLE PACKAGING

As the company grows and evolves, Accurate Box strives to make a positive impact on our community through our environmental, economic, and social sustainability initiatives. We manufacture 100% recyclable packaging that is sustainably sourced, continually revest in the business to produce more efficiently and minimize waste, and volunteer our time and donate to local non-profits to better our community.

MACHINE FILLED CARTON EXPERTISE

All of the cartons produced at Accurate Box are compatible with automated high-speed equipment used within customers’ plants. With the use of precision die-cutting, Accurate Box guarantees every box shipped will run effectively inside customers’ facilities.

ABOUT US

Accurate Box Company is one of the largest independent box manufacturers of litho-laminated corrugated packaging in the United States. All of Accurate Box's packaging is 100% recyclable and printed with eco-friendly inks. Founded in 1944, it is a fourth-generation family-owned and women-owned business that manufactures in New Jersey and ships competitively throughout all of North America.

LEARN MORE

We design, develop and manufacture case packers and tray packing solutions for flexible and other tough-to-handle packages such as doypacks, pillow bags and four-sided sealed bags. Built for around the clock operation, these solutions have a worldwide reputation for their quick change-over, flexibility, speed and comprehensible design. Integrated state of the art technologies include gravity, pick and place, wrap around and vision-guided robotics.

Driven by innovation

BluePrint Automation is all about innovation. And we have been from the very beginning. Based on the requirements of our customers, we develop innovative technologies and machines designed to exceed your expectations. Whether your organization is case packing products vertically or horizontally, we have the ideal solution available for you.

DISCOVER OUR SOLUTIONS

Global leader
+60 countries have chosen BPA

Thousands of companies in over 57 countries have chosen BPA. No matter where you are located, we support you with installing our automated packaging lines tailored to meet your needs. And we are always nearby, with three full-service manufacturing facilities in the U.S. and Europe, and six Sales & Support subsidiaries located across the globe.

Print & Apply Label Applicators
Print & Apply

CTM Printer Applicators include the versatile 3600 Series, known for its proven tamp-blow application and its right or left hand printer module assembly.

Learn More

LABEL APPLICATORS

Our selection of CTM Labeling Applicators includes the 360 Series and 360a Series models. Each are modular with either the merge, tamp-blow, or airblow nose module integrated. Purchase one style nose module or all three – the base core unit purchase will work with all three.

CUSTOM LABELING SYSTEMS

A segment of our core offering are custom designed and manufactured labeling systems. Exceptional expertise and craftsmanship at every level forge the finest labeling systems available on the market.

PRINT AND APPLY

Our selection of CTM Printer Applicators includes the 3600 Series. Within the product offering of the 3600 Series, we offer the Straight Tamp printer applicator, Dual Action Tamp printer applicator, Cornerwrap printer applicator, Swing Tamp printer applicator, Integrated Loose Loop printer applicator, RFID RW printer applicator and Servo Tamp printer applicator.

SEMI-AUTOMATIC LABELING SYSTEMS

Our Semi-Automatic Labeling Systems include our Tabletop Wrap Labeler and our Tabletop Workstation. Featuring customized labelers with speeds upto 50 PPM.

STANDARD LABELING SYSTEMS

Standard Labeling systems include but are not limited to: Top, Front, Front/Back, Wrap and Economy Wrap Labeling Systems. These CTM Labeling Systems are designed to accurately and efficiently apply pressure sensitive labels to a multitude of products.

Why Choose Us

 Our Commitment to Customer Support

Our Sales Support Team is fully integrated with our design and engineering team, as well as our technical support staff. Our sales staff is knowledgeable and passionate about our product lines, and maintains a relationship with our distributors that ensures that you’ll have full support at every stage of the purchasing process.


Our Flexibility and Integration Capabilities

When you begin to work with our sales support staff to choose a product that’s right for your team, you’ll have the opportunity to fill out a site survey which will allow our staff to determine precisely what your needs are. In addition, our staff will visit your site in order to work with you to select a system that will integrate fully into your workplace.


 Our Local Approach to Manufacturing

Our products are manufactured in the United States, ensuring that we are able to keep a close eye on the manufacturing process and the quality control procedures in place. In addition, our sales team and our technical support staff have a close familiarity with the process of design and manufacturing, ensuring seamless product support for your team.

Who We Are




Designing and manufacturing world class labeling systems is simply the way we do business at CTM Labeling Systems. Located in America's heartland, our "Made in the USA" pride won't accept anything less than cutting-edge, versatile products that stand the test of time.

From the design and engineering phase of each project through final system set-up and QC, exceptional expertise and craftsmanship at every level forge the finest labeling machines available on the market. Plus, our sales support staff is comprised of some of the most experienced, established, and well- respected professionals in the industry. Our team’s expertise is available to you from the moment you contact us throughout the life of your product

CTM’s “Made in the USA” pride allows us to manufacture world class labeling systems that stand the test of time.

Explore The Possibilities
We devise inventive ways to open, close and seal products.

It’s our mission to investigate and solve the problems others don’t even know exist. From uncovering packaging mismatches to identifying more optimal formats, we look at packaging differently. We'll find the solution to best fit your brand, fill product and your consumers, rather than basing decisions on convention or historic precedent.

Futurology
FUTUROLOGY
Ahead of the Curve
We redefine design possibilities, open up the consumer experiences of the future and deliver ground-breaking advances in packaging sustainability.
We transform innovative packaging ideas into fully-fledged commercial realities by taking into consideration every aspect of your package and the interdependencies between them all.
By carefully examining the container material, the geometry of the container, the fill product and the suitability of the foil, we ensure that any prospective innovations can become certified commercial solutions with the seal strength, optimal user experience and sustainable credentials to meet the demands of the modern marketplace.
FIND OUT MORE
Inventing the New, Elevating the Existing
We can open up a world of possibilities in new and innovative cap and container designs and shapes to elevate your brand, or, we can unlock solutions to help you maximise your impact within the limits of your existing packaging.
Guiding You Every Step of the Way
We're not just machine builders. We’ll work with you every step of the way – from evaluation to execution – guiding and advising throughout the journey, caring for your brand as if it were our own.
“By analyzing market trends, anticipating audience needs and pioneering closure technologies, our Futurology department will bring you tomorrow’s solutions today.”
Sefton Whitlock
Lead Futurologist
Why Work With FORDS?
Our blend of expertise, technology and unique foil closures bring game-changing benefits in package aesthetics, sustainability, accessibility, seal integrity, supply chain survival and so much more.

_

Lightweighted
Packages
By substituting unnecessary overcaps and weighty neck threads for FORDS’ foil closures you can lightweight your packaging by up to an incredible 60% without compromising on seal integrity.
Improved
Recyclability
Our foil caps are developed to peel away in a single motion and in one piece to provide the simplest separation of materials thus making mono-material recycling even easier for the consumer.
Enhanced Cap
Aesthetics
Our custom-designed caps help boost shelf impact, drive sales and build brand loyalty. FORDS closures can feature an array of printing and embossing techniques that can all be changed quickly and cost-effectively to stay fluid with your marketing campaigns.
Distinguished
Design
Whether it be following the conventions of round, rectangular or square containers, or breaking boundaries with ovals or unusual shapes, FORDS has the expertise and know-how to seal to any shape.
Improved
Accessibility
Our advanced R&D capabilities allow us to run an intensive diagnostics process to craft the perfect peel that balances seal integrity with easy opening for older or impaired consumers.
Crafted
User Experiences
We go the extra mile to ensure your package provides the peel experience you desire for your customers. From smooth, single-motion peels to much stronger, more durable peels, we can create the optimum peel profile for your brand and target market.
Extended
Shelf Life
FORDS foil closures provide a barrier against moisture, light and oxygen which keep products fresher for longer without the need for extra preservatives and additives.
Prolonged
Product Freshness
Our hermetic sealing technology ensures the contents within your packaging are fully preserved and completely safe to consume upon opening. We guarantee peace of mind, sealed in.
Supply Chain
Survival
FORDS can protect your products against leakages and punctures with minimal materials. We can carry out ISTA testing, altitude testing and more to ensure your package is fit for the demands of today’s diverse supply chains.
Increased Return
On Investment
Reduce your production costs dramatically with cost-effective foil caps instead of screw caps, hand pumps and other costly overcaps on refill and single serve products. And move to flexible roll-stock foil for greater procurement power.
Trusted Tamper
Evidence
Once a FORDS foil cap has been opened it is impossible to reseal or hide the deformation of the foil. This quality has been trusted by consumers worldwide for generations and is recognised as the gold standard.
Unparalleled
Versatility
Name your container material and we’ll be able to seal to it. Our versatile closures can be applied to various plastics, pulps, metals, composites, ceramics and glass.
Anti-Counterfeiting
Mechanisms
By utilizing specialist printing and embossing techniques on your foil caps, FORDS can safeguard your brand against counterfeiting. We can deploy your closure as a figurative and literal seal of authenticity by ensuring your packaging cannot be imitated.
Have a project in mind?
Whether you're looking to develop a new packaging format, optimize your existing package or explore our range of commercial equipment, we'll guide you along your packaging journey.

Who we are

We are Niverplast. A bunch of happy people on a mission to make our customers' lives easier, so they have fewer worries and are happier. That's why we make easy-to-use bag-in-box packaging machines and lines, designed for pre-made bags.

We don't want to make things more complicated than necessary. You can see this reflected throughout our entire organization. Without managers and complex structures, but with short lines of communication and autonomy. With happy colleagues, we create happy customers, that’s what we believe in!


What we do
Automating packaging processes

Our specialty in bag-in-box packaging solutions is not just about wrapping things up; it's about understanding your logistical process, bringing expertise and innovation to the table. In line with this, we can help you automate the following processes of your packaging process:

Case erecting
Bag placing
Bag closing
Product filling
Product counting
Compressing
Box transport
Palletizing
Quality Control

About Niverplast; your packaging machine company

We are passionate packaging machine builders at heart! But that's not where it all began. In 1986, it started with the trade in plastic bags. From there, we built our first automatic bagging machine. Transitioning from a plastic bag trader to a packaging machine factory was a natural step. Since then, bag-in-box packaging automation has become inseparable from Niverplast, we build packaging lines for various industries. And the plastic bags? We still provide those too! Everything we do, we do the Niverplast way. That’s where passion meets packaging. Because we still love people more than machines!

Get in touch!


Our team concludes passionate, qualified professionals around the world! Together with you we would love to improve your packaging process. By working together we can provide you with high quality, innovative and easy to operate packaging solutions.

We have the expertise and resources to help you succeed. We guarantee you the lowest total cost of ownership and will not stop until you, and we, are 100% satisfied.

Pregis Accelerates Path to Net Zero by 2040 with Wind Power

Pregis®, a global leader in protective packaging, mailing and bagging, and flexible packaging solutions, has taken a transformative step toward its 2040 net-zero pledge. In 2024, the company will match 100% of the electricity consumed at six facilities with wind power. The sites selected primarily produce curbside recyclable paper mailers. This milestone reduces market-based scope 2 emissions by over 4,000 metric tons of CO2e annually—the equivalent of driving from New York City to Los Angeles 3,723 times.

ShurSEAL® Solution

Purpose-Built for Secure Seals, Every Time™

The ShurSEAL® Packaging Solution is an automated case sealing system that combines high-performance Shurtape® packaging tape with innovative tape application technology. Designed to reduce material waste, downtime and maintenance costs, while increasing safety and content security, ShurSEAL delivers consistent and secure seals, carton after carton — to keep you running at peak production.

Talk to a Packaging Expert
ShurSEAL Features
Easy to Retrofit

Seamless integration with case erectors and sealers

Multiple Wipe-Down Points

Full use of the tape’s adhesive

Knifeless Opening Case Seals

With Folded Edge® Technology

Open Design

Easy tape threading

Rightsize Tape Length

Reduce tape use while maintaining secure seals

Why Choose ShurSEAL?
Enhanced Wipe-Down

Proper wipe-down pressure drives the tape’s adhesive into the surface, allowing the adhesive to entangle itself deep within the fibers of the carton to create a secure seal.

The amount of pressure that would be applied to a piece of tape on an under-filled carton, with the red signifying a significant amount of wipe-down pressure. ShurSEAL Packaging Solutions are designed with multiple wipe-down mechanisms that generate a more consistent pressure profile for secure seals, compared to competitiveapplication technology designed with rollers that often cannot generate the pinpoint load needed to fully engage the tape’s adhesive.

Reduce Tape Waste

Material waste is a common problem in manufacturing lines, with tape being a main contributor. In fact, 10-20% tape waste — caused by tear-outs and dispensing errors — is accepted as normal. From partially used “stub rolls” littered throughout factory floors to too much tape being applied to boxes, we observed end-of-line packaging inefficiencies first-hand and knew it was time to challenge the norm.

Designed to make a difference, The ShurSEAL Solution delivers:

Best In Class Wipe Down Force. Full use of the tape’s adhesive means a superior bond that can withstand the rigors of the distribution network – even with less tape on the box.
Rightsized Tape Application. Shorter, more consistent tape tab lengths on the sides of the box, narrower width tape or lower gauge tape on every box means less tape is wasted.
Good To The Core® Technology. Tape that’s smooth off the roll and doesn’t tear-out, plus full use of every roll of tape – all the way down to the core – means less stub rolls for the trash.
PrimeAlert™ Tape Management System

PrimeAlert is a self-contained, wireless and self-recharging tape management system that easily retrofits with ShurSEAL Packaging Solutions into existing packaging machinery. The system provides audible and visual alerts to signal line operators if any of the following faults occur:

Low tape
No/missing tape
Broken tape
Uncut tape
Case jam

PrimeAlert is available as a stand-alone unit with the additional options of a light tree for increased visibility and/or integration into an existing PLC system to shut down conveyors and prevent missed or faulty seals from reaching palletization.

A tape management system mitigates downtime by alerting operators as soon as a problem occurs, allowing them to replenish a consumed tape roll or troubleshoot the system before issues get out of hand. With PrimeAlert in place, you can stop worrying about case seals and start putting your attention to other things.

Case Sealing Evaluation

Our case sealing evaluation is a process that generates a simple, data-based report that compares your “current state” case packing, sealing and palletizing operations to that same operation with a ShurSEAL automated case sealing solution installed.

Learn More

Wipotec Website
Innovation and passion for technology

Wipotec is your innovative, reliable partner for high performance, process and customer-oriented weighing and inspection solutions.

As one of the world's leading businesses for dynamic weighing technology and product control, Wipotec stands for outstanding manufacturing quality "Made in Germany", the highest ease of integration and profound sector expertise.

Our market driven weighing and inspection solutions extend across the following categories:

Checkweighers and Metal Detectors
X-ray scanners and optical inspections
Track & Trace solutions
Marking systems
Catchweighers and DWS systems
Weigh Cells, Weighing Kits and Accessories
News
No news available.
Everything from a single source and united under one roof: 85 % vertical integration at Wipotec in Kaiserslautern

In addition to the classic commercial functions, Wipotec bundles basic research, hardware and software development, design, project management and production in a 48,000 m2 competence center with unbeatable vertical integration.

This is an unusual value even for highly specialized German machine construction. It is the guarantee of our long-term and comprehensive delivery reliability. We are proud of this record.

ADVANCING
PACKAGING®
OUR COMPANY
OUR COMPANY

All-Fill designs, manufactures, services and supports a line of packaging machinery including; auger, piston, vibratory & cup fillers, bagging, checkweighing, labeling & bottle unscrambling equipment. We are committed more than ever to becoming the single source for all of your packaging machinery solutions.

AUGER FILLERS

The Auger Filler is the foundation of All-Fill's product line and machine that the company was built on. Our Auger Filler is second to none and continues to be the standard in the industry. Learn more about and Semi-Automatic and Automatic models.

AUGER FILLERS
VIBRATORY FILLERS

All-Fill vibratory fillers provide you the perfect blend of accuracy, speed and versatility across our comprehensive line of net weigh fillers. Our vibratory line excels in the handling of difficult and delicate whole products. All-Fill vibratory fillers are designed to handle your unique products along with precise weights.

VIBRATORY FILLERS
CUP FILLERS

All-Fill volumetric cup filler systems can be used to dispense a variety of dry free-flowing products such as beans, rice, pet food, popcorn, candy, seeds, grains, nuts and many more without any product degradation.

CUP FILLERS
PISTON FILLERS

All-Fill liquid filling machines combine precision, speed and versatility in liquid filling technology designed for liquids, pastes, creams and other viscous products. Learn more about and Semi-Automatic and Automatic models.

PISTON FILLERS
CHECKWEIGHERS

Formerly known as Alpha Checkweighers, All-Fill Checkweighers offer a comprehensive range of online, in production weighing and weight control equipment. Our machines can be adapted to handle virtually every package, bag, carton, box and bottle and sold as standalone or integrated systems with other All-Fill equipment.

CHECKWEIGHERS
VFFS BAGGERS

Formerly known as Avatar, All-Fill's line of Vertical Form Fill & Seal machines is your complete bagging solution. Our machines are engineered to accommodate a variety of bag styles for virtually any application and meet your speed requirements.

VFFS BAGGERS
LABELERS

Formerly Re-Pack, All-Fill manufactures a variety of industrial labeling systems to accommodate most budgets and production requirements. Available in Semi-Automatic with table top options, or Automatic designs with integrated conveyor.

LABELERS
UNSCRAMBLERS

Formerly Palace Packaging, All-Fill manufactures a line of high speed container handling and bottle unscrambling machines to keep up with your packaging demands. Bottle unscramblers process bulk amounts of most bottle styles, and orient them onto a conveying line for filling.

UNSCRAMBLERS

CUSTOM MACHINES

All-Fill has realized that one size does not fit all. Custom Solutions represents our ability to provide extensive design and fabrication expertise for packaging equipment. Your applications will be thoroughly analyzed and an appropriate solution will be developed, designed, and manufactured to exceed your packaging demands.

CUSTOM MACHINES
OUR TEAM

No matter the business, the key to success is hard work, determination and good people. Never was this truer than the beginning, the early years in which the first employees were laying the structural foundation and required work ethic for long term success and growth. All-Fill wouldn't be where it is today without the extraordinary group of employees that have called All-Fill home for many years.

OUR TEAM
PARTS SUPPORT

All-Fill machines are designed using the most innovative controls and the highest quality parts and components. Our parts department provides quality support in a timely manner to reduce your downtime and stocks most parts for quick delivery. From mechanical assemblies, electronic components, tooling, machine accessories and software, we have the parts you need on standby.

PARTS SUPPORT
OUR HISTORY

Founded in 1969, All-Fill’s initial offering was an economical, highly reliable auger filler for powder and liquid filling that featured a simplified, “no nonsense” design. It could accurately dispense product with a minimum amount of setup, maintenance or operator intervention. With a legacy that spans more than 50 years and three generations of Edgintons, All-Fill machines continue to revolutionize the industry.

OUR HISTORY
AFI WEST

The need for speed, accuracy, and reduced waste has never been more critical than now. We provide exceptionally rugged, reliable, and accurate equipment to help you meet increasing demands. All-Fill is happy to announce that we are heading west! In late summer of 2020, we will be opening a new sales and support center in Scottsdale, Arizona to better serve our west coast clients and expand operations.

AFI WEST
CAREERS

We are truly committed to providing our staff with a rewarding and innovative work environment. All-Fill has a legacy of being an industry leader, and continues to invent new ways to work faster and smarter, leading to a wealth of career opportunities. We’re always looking for dynamic, driven individuals to join our growing and team.

CAREERS
CONTACT US

All-Fill’s packaging machinery is available worldwide for almost any product and industry. Our global presence means uncompromising service and support, no matter what or where your needs are. Reach out today to discuss your project with our international sales team. Our more than 50 years of engineering expertise combined with our industry leading field support makes us a leader in the industry.

CONTACT US
SERVICE SUPPORT

We understand downtime and its effect on your bottom line. Packaging machinery is only as strong as its service and support system. If you run into challenges, All-Fill’s Service team consists of 15 full time service employees with over 150 years of combined experience in the packaging industry. Our team can train, install, and troubleshoot any All-Fill machinery.

SERVICE SUPPORT

Our Numbers
01
Packaging Consulting
Cama Group’s Packaging Department has 30+ years’ experience in the design and testing of packaging paperboard and cardboard. We’ll help you optimize your packaging designs and make them work in harmony with automated machines.
02
System Engineering
Cama Group treats every order as a separate project. Our project management is both cost and schedule driven to ensure that each project is on-time and within budget.
03
Sustainability
We design sustainability into our machines… and into your packaging! Lower energy consumption, reduced waste, more efficient packaging design and recyclable/reuseable materials are part of our ethos. We can help you transition to more sustainable packaging.
04
After-Sales Support
Our expert team is ready to support you with an extensive Service Package that will help you and your staff to maintain the best efficiency for your packaging systems.

YOUR TRUSTED PARTNER FOR FULLY
INTEGRATED END-OF-LINE SYSTEMS

Transform your palletizing and bagging operations with innovative custom-engineered solutions that harness the power of automation.

Work With Us
WHAT SETS US APART

For nearly 30 years, we’ve been helping our customers become more competitive, cost-effective, and productive in a fast-changing world with robotic end-of-line palletizing systems.

Partnership

Your business goals matter to us. Whether you’re seeking to expand, move, gain efficiency, solve labor challenges, or improve your bottom line, we measure our success by how well our solution helps you achieve your vision of success.

Solutions

Your growth depends on flexible systems that can meet your changing needs. We custom engineer not only for your current environment, but also for the future–so as your production requirements change, your palletizing system can, too.

Value

An end-of-line system is a big investment. We make the decision easier with our dedication to your ROI. Our equipment is built to last–increasing productivity, minimizing downtime, and saving you money on service costs.

Service

Have peace of mind knowing you have industry-leading customer service backing you up 24/7/365. Enjoy easy access to operations and maintenance training programs as well as in-stock OEM parts.

AVAILABLE SOLUTIONS FOR PACKAGING

With our focus on integration, we design robotic palletizing systems to meet your needs. Our range of solutions solve end-of-line challenges for operations of all sizes–from small, family-owned grass seed farms to large corporations–always with the highest levels of safety and performance.

Bags

Our bag palletizing solutions offer the ultimate in flexibility and precision, accommodating open-mouth, valve, and FFS style bags as well as a variety of conditioning and handling accessories.

Cases

High-speed robotic palletizing and product handling equipment like bar code scanners ensure your operation runs as efficiently as possible.

Pails

Regardless of your pails’ shape, weight, and nesting requirements, our robots’ accuracy makes them perfectly suited for producing stable loads.

Bundles

Our custom end effectors provide gentle, reliable handling. Stay running at peak performance with load stabilizing solutions like slip sheet handling and soft turn conveyors.

Tray

Whether you’re a small local brewery or a high-speed canner, fork style end effectors ensure your products are handled as fast and safely as possible.

Custom

Our custom end effectors provide gentle, reliable handling. If it can be stacked, we can build a tool to palletize your product.

CUSTOM SOLUTIONS FOR YOUR INDUSTRY
Food

From varied packaging to unique sanitation standards, we ensure the speed and product handling needed.

Food
 
Beverages

Craft breweries, wineries, and distilleries enlist our help in taking their products to a larger market.

Beverages
 
Agriculture

We’ve helped hundreds of customers update their facilities and produce more through automation.

Agriculture
 
Building & Construction Materials

Our machines are built to last, and also built to perform reliably even in harsh environments.

Building & Construction Materials
 
Animal Nutrition

Livestock feed manufacturers gain a competitive edge with our flexible systems in your current footprint.

Animal Nutrition
 
Pet Care

Keep up with the fast-growing pet care industry by delivering more safe, quality products.

Pet Care
 
Pharmaceuticals & Personal Care

From medicines to diapers, our customers count on us for speed and careful product handling.

Pharmaceuticals & Personal Care
 
Chemicals & Petrochemicals

Our robots are customized to withstand the challenges of working with hazardous materials.

Chemicals & Petrochemicals
TRANSFORMATIVE END-OF-LINE SOLUTIONS
Industrial Robots

Industrial robots can palletize and multi-pick heavy loads with speed and reliability.

Collaborative Robots

Cobots safely share space with employees, can multi-pick, and palletize loads up to 66 lbs.

Open-Mouth Bagging Machines

We are the exclusive North American provider of STATEC BINDER automatic bagging machines.

Integrated Equipment

We create custom fully integrated end-of-line systems that may include pallet dispensers, sheet dispensers, end-effectors, and safety equipment.

ABOUT US

For nearly 30 years, we’ve been helping our customers become more competitive, cost-effective, and productive in a fast-changing world.

OUR PARTNERSHIP PROMISE

From installation to 24/7 technical trouble-shooting, you’re getting a complete support and service team you can always rely on.

Conveying Equipment

WHO WE HELP

UPTIME IS THE ONLY TIME THAT MATTERS!

Integrated Packaging for Food, Dairy & Beverage Industries

Food Packaging Equipment Line Integration and Automation

Integrated Packaging Machinery designs, integrates, installs and automates sanitary food and beverage packaging systems. Our deep expertise is all focused on maximizing packaging line uptime. We integrate the best technology into new packaging lines, or retrofit an upgrade solution into existing food packaging systems.

Our approach to customer-specific integration empowers all of our RTE, frozen food and co-packer food packaging customers to satisfy the quality expectations of their wholesale and retail end-users.

Located in the heart of West Michigan, Integrated Packaging Machinery is
the leader in food packaging machine manufacturing and integration of
downstream, end-of-line packaging equipment. IPM serves both US and International clients in the food & beverage industry.

Where Your Conveyor Solutions Begin!

MCE (Modular Conveyor Express) partners with distributors who are dedicated to providing high quality conveyor systems to manufacturers across the country. As part of Nercon, MCE has a team proficient in technical design and a production facility with unmatched manufacturing capabilities; all to provide superior complete conveyor systems quickly and competitively.

What's New

 

NEW to MCE - Bi-Directional Accumulation Conveyor

MCE's bi-directional accumulation table is a solution for accumulation pressure problems.

Beverage Conveyor System Concept

MCE’s modular conveyor design and equipment solutions are flexible and easy to assemble for quick reconfiguration of new projects or existing production lines.

MCE's Versatile Low Profile Belt Conveyor 

MCE's modular low profile belt conveyors provide long life to belt systems, moving products through production lines to ensure positive tracking while providing a quiet, smooth, and trouble-free performance.

TableTop Conveyor

MCE tabletop conveyors are a pre-engineered stock item with common parts in-stock, providing quick shipments and value pricing. These conveyor systems are proven in the industry and are built more ruggedly than competing modular conveyors.

Learn More

MatTop Conveyor

Modular Conveyor Express offers quick shipping and value pricing. MatTop conveyors provide long life and high impact resistance. These versatile conveyors handle flexible packaging, plastic containers, cartons, cases and bundles providing flexibility in package handling.

Learn More

Belt Conveyor

Modular Conveyor Express provides low profile belt conveyor systems with a range of options including belting, gear motors, drives, side guides, and support stands.

Nercon has designed and manufactured unique conveyor systems and conveyor equipment for all types of consumer-packaged goods since 1976.  Our goal is to add value to each project that goes out the door, which is why Nercon focuses on one thing: conveyors. We’ve applied our years of experience to developing a comprehensive production process that starts with an initial concept and finishes with a solution that moves your products forward efficiently. 

Designed with a Purpose®, is a practice that not only moves product from point A to point B, but also keeps your projects and goals on time.

"The team support you guys provide is just one of the many reasons we love to work with Nercon." 

-Andy Brabant, Mechanical Designer, Zepnick Solutions, Inc

What's New


NEW - DRAPER Z INCLINE CONVEYOR

Made to provide manufacturers with an elevation solution for reducing changeover time, Nercon's Draper Z Incline conveyor elevates and lowers varying shaped products consecutively with no need for time-consuming changeover adjustments. Click to learn more about Nercon’s Draper Z Incline conveyor.

10 BUSINESS DAY DELIVERY ADVANTAGE

Nercon's new streamlined design of the 48" rotary accumulation table now has a 10 business day delivery advantage. Contact a member of our sales team to learn about the new pricing advantage too.

Contact Nercon

PET FOOD CONVEYOR SYSTEMS

Nercon’s pet food conveyor systems and equipment focus on the concerns of pet food processors, product quality, and food safety. Our ProCore conveyors help pet food manufacturers maximize performance and reduce changeover times in their production lines while our HydroCore conveyors are built to maximize productivity with food-safety in mind and built for sanitary needs.

PMI KYOTO:
The Leader of the Pack
Built with Pride.
Built to Perform.

When it comes to packaging automation, having equipment you can count on is a top priority. We understand that you have deadlines and throughput numbers that must be met, which means you can’t afford equipment failures or gaps in production. Therefore, partnering with a dependable packaging machine manufacturer is of the utmost importance. Reliable industrial packaging machines make all the difference between meeting your output needs and coming up short. Many of our customers report their machines are still running efficiently after more than 20 years! From case packers to vertical cartoners, our team of engineers can design any type of end-of-line packaging solution to meet your needs. No other packaging machinery company offers you the same level of reliability.  

We Don’t Just Build Equipment.
We Build Lasting Partnerships.

At PMI KYOTO, we’re more than just a packaging machinery supplier: We are a true partner you can rely on moving forward. As your packaging machinery manufacturer, we’re with you every step of the way, and we’re dedicated to making sure your new equipment delivers the highest levels of performance and productivity. After building, testing, and installing your easy-to-use system, we provide an unparalleled level of aftermarket service. From operator training to ongoing support and maintenance, we take a personalized approach for every client and always aim to exceed expectations. This has been a key component of what makes us the top food packaging equipment supplier and more.  

Support Services
A Proud Member of Industry Associations
Unpacking
the PMI KYOTO Story

PMI Cartoning was founded in Elk Grove Village, Illinois in 1993. As the company grew, a 100,000 sq. ft. manufacturing, engineering, and testing facility as well as a rebuild facility were constructed nearby. In 2017, Kyoto Seisakusho Co., Ltd., the #1 automated packaging equipment manufacturer in Japan, acquired PMI, giving us invaluable access to the robotic automation capabilities that are currently shaping the packaging world. Today, the former PMI Cartoning operates in its original Elk Grove Village location as PMI KYOTO Packaging Systems. We’re proud to be recognized as a market–leading packaging equipment company, and we are excited to show you how we earned our position.

Busch Group Sponsors and Supports Aerospace Drives Conference

At the Łukasiewicz Institute of Aviation in Warsaw, the 13th conference on “Development Trends in Space Propulsion Systems” took place. The event was sponsored by Busch Poland and supported by the R&D team from Pfeiffer Vacuum+Fab Solutions. The Łukasiewicz Institute of Aviation is a prestigious research and development center and a Pfeiffer customer.

Read more
MRPC Receives “Innovation in Vacuum Busch Award”

The “Innovation in Vacuum Busch Award” goes to the Norwegian company MRPC (Marine Roll & Pitch Control) for its innovative buoyancy control system to stabilize ships, offshore wind turbines, and other floating units.

Read more
Busch Donates 25,000 Euro to Phaenovum

In 2024, the Busch Group once again funded the Lörrach student research center with 20,000 Euro. This is in addition to its annual donation of 5,000 Euro towards phaenovum’s participation in the international robot competition RoboRave.

Read more
Busch Donates 3,000 Euro to Women’s Counseling Center

The Busch Group has once again donated 3,000 Euro to the women’s counseling center in Lörrach. Since 2019, the company has been regularly supporting the charity. It uses the money for its prevention projects against sexual violence, which run under the motto “courage feels good.”

Read more
Sponsorship of a Student Racing Team

The Busch Group provided the Formula Student Team of TU Hamburg with a ZEBRA vacuum pump. With its help, the students manufactured carbon fiber vehicle parts for their racing car through vacuum infusion.

Read more
Wear It Pink

During International Breast Cancer Month, Busch Group employees from different countries organized campaign days to raise awareness of the disease and the importance of early detection. Donations were collected for organizations that aim to combat this form of cancer.

The Busch Group has expanded the production facility of Pfeiffer Vacuum+Fab Solutions in Romania. The new premises have now been inaugurated.

Production Solutions By Application

EDL Packaging manufactures an extensive line of shrink wrappers and shrink bundlers, corrugate tray formers and loaders, roll wrappers, automatic flight bar wrappers, and semi-automatic wrappers. EDL customers range from small business entrepreneurs with a small semi-automated wrapper to worldwide manufacturers of consumer and industrial products using over 30 of our premium shrink bundling machines.

For over 50 years, EDL shrink wrappers and bundlers have been providing packaging solutions to the pet food, dairy, personal care, food, food service consumables, carpet and contract packaging industries.

THE SUSTAINABLE SOLUTION

It may surprise you to learn that not only is recycled plastic sustainable, but it’s the sustainable solution. Provided it already exists, that is. That’s why we use 100% recycled and recyclable HDPE, so we can reuse the plastic we already have indefinitely.

0
RECYCLED MILK JUGS

have been collected, shredded, extruded into pellets to create PakTech products.

0
POUNDS OF PLASTIC SAVED

from landfills and oceans and used to make PakTech products.

0
ACRES OF LAND

have been saved from landfill waste by repurposing recycled containers into PakTech products. 

0
POUNDS OF RECYCLED HANDLES

have been collected locally here in Eugene, OR and repurposed into new handles.

WHAT IS HDPE?

HDPE stands for high-density polyethylene, the same material used to make milk jugs. HDPE is strong, sturdy, flexible,        non-toxic and food safe. It is one of the most widely collected and recycled materials and is indefinitely recyclable. After extensive testing and for the reasons above, PakTech chose 100% recycled and recyclable HDPE as the preferred material    for their sustainable packaging handles. Our recycled content is certified by SCS Global Services.

Sustainability

We believe that the use of sustainable materials for packaging is the future. To that end, we have a team dedicated to developing Printpack Preserve™ packaging structures which include recycled content, recyclable plastic, paper, and compostable materials. With over 100 pre-qualified letters, we are committed to helping our customers not only improve their speed to market but also reach their sustainability goals.

Our Sustainability Initiatives
Recycled Content

Recycled content packaging is recognized by consumers for its environmental benefits, making it easy for brands to connect with customers.

Curbside Recyclable Paper

Paper packaging is the most widely recycled type of packaging because it is curbside recyclable.

Compostable packaging

Printpack has a portfolio of compostable films, inks, and adhesives to allow brands to design for certified-compostable packaging.

Recyclable Polyethylene

Our pre-qualified recyclable polyethylene (PE) packaging offers many of the benefits of current flexible packaging with one huge advantage - store drop off recycling.

Our references
Customers from various industries rely on our experience in end-of-line packaging. We offer individual solutions for the most diverse requirements! We combine proven expertise with our innovative spirit to meet the diverse requirements of our customers. This results in high-tech packaging machines at the highest level.
OUR REFERENCES
Packaging machines "Made in Germany"

SOMIC Packaging - Engineered to perform!

SOMIC is developing and manufacturing high-quality packaging machines for food, non-food, pharma and many other industries since 1974. Our enthusiasm for high-tech and perfection in implementation have made us a leading international manufacturer of carton and corrugated packaging machines. With our passion for innovative technology, we are your competent partner for shelf-ready packaging. Our packaging machines score with a compact footprint and maximum performance. Flexibility, efficiency, and ergonomics are the other quality features of our end-of-line packaging machines. Made in Germany - assembled in the USA!

LEARN MORE ABOUT US!

SOMIC Career:
Let’s perform together. Career at SOMIC
Do you want to be part of the SOMIC team?
At SOMIC, we not only create solutions for packaging tasks, but also careers. We are looking for committed and talented people who want to shape the future of the company together with us. Exciting challenges, a collegial working environment and the opportunity to take your skills to the next level are waiting for you. Join our team in Inver Grove Heights, Minnesota!
OUR VACANCIES
Our steps towards sustainability:
For a liveable future
Sustainability at SOMIC
Headquartered in Germany, our North American subsidiary is located close to the Twin Cities in Inver Grove Heights, Minnesota. We are close to nature, down-to-earth and think in generations instead of quarters. With this spirit, SOMIC machines are designed for extended operational longevity that produce stable, functional and safe packaging for world-renowned products.
SUSTAINABILITY AT SOMIC
Our services pack quite a punch. You can count on that.
Our facility in Inver Grove Heights, MN provides fast and professional support. Regardless of whether your manufacturing sites are in Canada, USA or Mexico, highly qualified Somic Service engineers are on hand to assist you. Either personally on site or available via remote support – you can count on expert support to address all your needs, ranging from consulting, training, machine installation, inspections and maintenance, through spare part orders to machine modifications of all kinds.

Production Solutions By Application

Ideal Pase offer custom liquid filling machine solutions to the paint/coatings, chemical, lubricant and food industries providing customers with the most comprehensive liquid filling and packaging line equipment solutions available.

Ideal Pase technologies include container denesting, net weight liquid filling, lid placing, lid closing, palletizing, depalletizing, material handling and individual filling machines in addition to fully integrated filling and packaging line solutions. Ideal Pase offers a full line of liquid filling machines including both automatic and semi-automatic models allowing for true “Pipe to Pallet” packaging operations.

Containers & Products

The size of containers the IdealPase’s lineup of liquid filling machines can handle ranges from small half pint containers up to large drums and totes. Our Automatic and Semi-Automatic Lines are perfect for small containers up to Gallons and Pails. The PT Series excels at Drums and Totes.

Our Liquid Filling Machines are designed to increase your yields, productivity and efficiency. Determining which Ideal Filling machine best meets your requirements is a combination of your product qualities, production volumes, container sizes, filling accuracy and your budget.

Global Leader in Precision Technology Solutions & Engineering Since 1954

Nordson was founded in 1954 and headquartered in Westlake, Ohio, USA. Over the past decades, we have grown to become a self-renewing, global organization, and we now have operations and support offices in more than 35 countries. Nordson offers a wide range of precision technology solutions across industries. Equipment manufacturing is a primary focus across our divisions, and our specialties include precision dispensing, fluid management, and surface treatment. Our equipment is used to seal cereal boxes, and to complete life-saving medical procedures. Our reach is vast and our solutions are varied, but our quality never wavers.

In addition, we offer precision technology solutions that help our customers meet the quality standards they strive for in their own products, with measurement, testing, and inspection solutions. For example, we create precision manufacturing equipment including optical, acoustic, x-ray, and semiconductor inspection machines.

From aerospace technology to consumables, we provide innovative precision engineering solutions that can transform how you do business and improve the lives of those who receive your end products.

LEARN MORE
Join The Nordson Team
Our team of professionals is comprised of 6,800 global employees thriving in an environment where they are supported and encouraged to be their best. Working side by side, we build meaningful connections with each other, our customers and our communities.

TECHNOLOGY
The New Maxpack MFT 7
Ultimate Range

The crown jewel of the Maxpack lineup. The new MFT 7 Ultimate  Range is the only VFFS in the market with a width range from 60″ to 350″. You can say this model is equivalent to 3 VFFS in 1. 

Think about it, this range allows you to pack from a single serve 2oz (57g) bag of trail mix, to a 20lb bag of rice. Or how about a multipack of frozen fruits with single serve frozen fruit bags packed in a bulk bag (bag-in-bag). It’s also perfect for sampling, we know how importan samples are for product introduction. The limits are in your imagination.


Among other features, the MFT 7 UR has Maxpack’s category leading multi-format capabilities for INNO-LOK® face zipper, EZ-Stand® stand-up pouch and a hybrid sealing system with constant PE technology, pug/play remote access capabilities. a full 360-degree access and an innovative triple servo system. 

The Maxpack MFT 7 UR was the finalist in the food/beverage category and awarded best VFFS in show in the Technology Excellence Awards at Pack Expo International – the world’s leading processing and packaging machinery expo. 

View more
The New Maxpack MFR3
Premade Bagger

The explosive growth of pre-made stand up pouches has made the Maxpack MFR 3 Maxpack's top selling model. The new Maxpack MFR 3 has new premium features and a rugged construction specifically considered to withstand cold and humid environments. 

The Maxpack MFR 3 is the 3rd generation rotary fill & seal machine for pre-made stand-up pouches. We've engineered a machine made specifically for lean, mid-stage CPG companies that have multiple SKUs, with different widths, who usually pack in multiple smaller runs and require easy, quick, cleaning and changeover. Changeovers in the MFR 3 are a walk in the park due to its automatic format adjustment system.

The MFR 3 is packing from frozen seafood - including the biggest brands of frozen and value added shrimp in the world - vegetables, fruits, to chips, snacks, dried fruits and pet food. 

The Maxpack MFR 3 is the only pre-made pouch bagger in it's category able to pack the innovative STANDCAP.

View More
WHO WE ARE

Maxpack Machinery is the category leader in the manufacturing of packaging machinery driven by robotic technology. Maxpack is widely considered the main option for growth stage companies; particularly in the frozen, ready-to-eat, coffee and snacks industries, and it is the fastest growing company in its segment in the United States.

WHAT WE DO

For global markets, Maxpack Machinery designs, manufactures and markets a next-generation Vertical Form-Fill & Seal VFFS Machine (MFT 7 Ultimate Range and MFT Standard) and a Rotary Machine (MFR 3 Superfoods) for Pre-Made Doypack Bags (Stand Up Pouch). 

For Latinamerica exclusively, the portfolio also includes the best selling Maxpack Bottling Line (MBL) of In-Line Filling, Capping and Labeling Machines. Maxpack Machinery leverages on the expertise of Siemens, Allen Bradley, ABB, Festo, Schnider, SMC, Panasonic and other global brands to assure performance, reliability and connectivity.

Sanitary Vertical Form Fill Seal Baggers and More
We’ve been keeping food safe since 1923. For three generations, our family-owned and operated business has provided innovative sanitary packaging solutions that are built to last and supported in the USA. From vertical form fill seal baggers (VFFS) to bag-in-box cartoners, pre-made pouch fillers and multihead weighers, Triangle covers all your food-safe packaging needs. Triangle sanitary packaging machines offer versatility while providing solutions that maximize production. Whether you need to weigh or bag seafood, mashed potatoes, baking mix, put a bag of cereal in a box or a variety of other products, there’s a Triangle solution engineered to meet your application.
Choose your Triangle Solution
VFFS Bag Machines

Most versatile and sanitary VFFS baggers on the market. From powders to wet proteins to liquids. Proven performance in harsh environments. Smart IO technology, ultrasonic sealing, rotatable jaws and more.

LEARN MORE
Bag-in-Box Cartoners

Flexibility in a small footprint. Quick, auto-changeover from single to dual or quad packs in seconds. Pairs perfectly with a Triangle bagger and weigher combination. A unique belt infeed system protects your product.

LEARN MORE
Pre-Made Pouch Fillers

Simple, automated solution for filling and sealing pre-made pouches. Run Doy bags, 3-sided seal, flat and stand-up pouches (SUP) with ease. Simple integration with multihead weighers, augers or cup fillers.

LEARN MORE
Multihead Weighers

From cereal to wet proteins, and everything in between. Unmatched accuracy and speed. Even product distribution for optimal production. Mount directly on top of Triangle VFFS baggers. No mezzanines required.

LEARN MORE

Multiply Your Value.

MULTIVAC is a family business from the Allgäu region in southern Germany that operates at an international level. With integrated packaging and processing solutions, we offer customers from the food, consumer & industrial goods and medical & pharmaceutical sectors exactly what they need: Individual added value - across the entire logistics chain.

With over 80 subsidiaries, we are on site for our customers in 165 countries and support individual customers of all sizes just as directly and personally as multinational companies.

What would you like to package or process?
Food
Innovative packaging solutions for fresh meat, sausage and deli meats, alternative proteins, poultry, cheese and snacks – reliably processed and packaged with MULTIVAC.

Medical products
MULTIVAC packaging solutions for sterile medical products ensure reliable, reproducible and traceable processes.

Pharmaceutical products
MULTIVAC offers solutions for the flexible packaging of syringes, vials, ampoules, auto injectors, active stents, pens and many other pharmaceutical products.

Industrial and consumer products
MULTIVAC packaging for industrial and consumer products is produced on sustainable, customized packaging machines and lines.

Current top topics

Majority stake in Italianpack S.p.A.

MULTIVAC Group acquires a majority stake in Italianpack S.p.A.

The MULTIVAC Group has acquired a majority holding of 80 percent in Italianpack S.p.A., a manufacturer of packaging machines. Italianpack will be integrated into the MULTIVAC organization as a new business unit, which will enable the portfolio to be expanded to include traysealers in the lower and medium price segments, as well as other peripheral equipment. The aim is to strengthen the market position and better meet customer requirements.

Refined automation with vacuum technology
Piab's vacuum-driven handling systems and robotic tools are utilized in every industrial sector around the globe. Our tailored solutions support applications from raw material handling to assembly, sorting and packaging of single objects regardless of size, weight, shape or rank in the production process.
 Productivity

Piab's vacuum-driven solutions significantly reduce manual labour for increased productivity, consistent performance, and upheld quality standards.

 Flexibility

Vacuum-driven systems reduce harmful work tasks and enable safe handling of industrial components ranging from powders and grains to single objects of significant size and weight.

 Sustainability

Due to their technology and design, Piab vacuum systems ensure long service life, minimal maintenance and low energy consumption which reduces the environmental impact.

Product news
12/11/2024
Custom tool CPT now a configurable product
After two successful years as a custom line product, cobot palletizing tool CPT is now due for a move to the standard assortment. “We’re happy to provide this versatile tool as a fully configurable product to all customers in search of state-of-the-art palletizing”, says Madeleine Sheikh, Global Product Manager.
Product news
05/11/2024
piGRIP® FLC expands Piab’s suction cup universe
piGRIP® FLC is a new component, an interface, that expands the usability of all existing Piab suction cups. “Regardless of application, this product helps handling height differences and off-angle-picking in a simplified yet sophisticated way” says Lennart Ryberg, Product Manager of Piab Vacuum Automation Division.
Product news
25/06/2024
Piab revolutionizes vacuum system configuration with OVM Pro 3D tool
Piab has launched its highly anticipated OVM Pro 3D, a cutting-edge on-line tool designed to transform the way vacuum systems are configured, simulated and optimized. "OVM Pro 3D represents a major leap forward for the design of vacuum systems”, says Josef Karbassi, Acting President of the Vacuum Automation Division.

We Build Unscramblers

New England Machinery (NEM) manufactures a full line of Bottle Unscramblers to sort, organize, orient and deliver bottles or containers into a single, upright and orderly fashion, right onto your production line. Whether your container is large or small, your production line is fast or slow, or your product is pharmaceutical, food, beverage, cosmetic, or chemical, NEM has a low or high speed bottle unscrambling system to help maximize your production line efficiency.

LEARN MORE

 

We Build Cappers

New England Machinery (NEM) manufactures a full line of Capping Systems including Bottle Capping Machines, Container Capping Machines and Cap Sorters for any application. NEM’s Capping Machines and Bottle Cappers tighten screw-caps and lug-type caps, close oriented and non-oriented push-down closures, and secure plugs, fitments and lids ensuring all are securely placed on your bottle or container.

PROVEN SYSTEMS WITH UNMATCHED RESULTS

Incredible speed, flexibility, sanitary design, and superior customer support.

Propack Processing & Packaging Systems Inc. is an industry leader in robotics and innovation, manufacturing and supplying high-performance processing and packaging machinery for the global market. With over 25 years of experience, our Propack team also boasts high-level system integration expertise, offering complete solutions and seamless integration for primary and secondary packaging operations.

At Propack, we pride ourselves on working collaboratively with clients to build strong relationships and ensure the best solutions are developed to meet their unique needs.

Packaging Solutions

From carton and tray loaders to row distribution systems, Propack’s automated packaging machinery provides high-speed, reliable and flexible solutions to meet client-specific needs. Our robotic systems handle a variety of applications and packaging styles, and are designed to maximize productivity, uptime and total cost of ownership.

Processing Solutions

Every machine in Propack’s processing line has been developed to meet the highest level of sanitation standards. Specializing in cold bar forming lines, our innovative processing technology ensures excellent quality control, throughput, flexibility and overall high-performance to provide the most efficient process for our clients.

Integrated Solutions

Propack’s team offers comprehensive knowledge of system integration, process design, engineering and overall management. We work closely with each client to understand their specific requirements and develop integrated packaging solutions tailored to meet their needs.

INDUSTRIES

Propack’s best-in-class food processing and packaging equipment serves the needs of a variety of industries.

MENÜ

PICK AND PLACE MASCHINEN

MEHR ALS NUR AUTOMATISIERUNG: DIE PICK AND PLACE MASCHINEN VON SCHUBERT
Verpackungslösung & Technologie
Beratung, Service & Support
Schubert Group & Unternehmen
Stellenangebote & Karriere
Branchen & Industrielösungen
EINFACHE LÖSUNGEN FÜR JEDE VERPACKUNGS­­AUFGABE

Weltweit anerkannter Marktführer für Toploading-Verpackungsmaschinen

Die Gerhard Schubert GmbH ist Vorreiter bei der Entwicklung von modularen Verpackungs­maschinen und passgenauen Service­leistungen für verschiedenste Branchen – von Pharma und Kosmetik über Getränke, Nahrungsmittel und Süßwaren bis hin zu technischen Artikeln.

Pionier, Trendsetter & Innovator

Das Familien­unternehmen aus Crailsheim (Baden-Württemberg, Deutschland) setzt bei seinen digitalen, roboterbasierten Verpackungs­maschinen auf ein Zusammenspiel von einfacher Mechanik, intelligenter Steuerungstechnik und skalierbarer Modularität.

Familienunternehmen seit 1966

Die Schubert-Gruppe steht Kunden nicht nur als Hersteller von Verpackungs­maschinen und Automatisierungs­lösungen zur Seite, sondern verfügt darüber hinaus über ein kompetentes Beratungsteam, das maßgeschneiderte Lösungen für Ihren Anwendungs­fall entwickelt.

VERPACKUNGS­­LÖSUNGEN

Erst, wenn eine perfekte Kombination aus Material, Verpackung und Maschine so flexibel ist, dass sie auch bei neuen Anforderungen immer noch perfekt funktioniert, sind wir bei Schubert zufrieden. Deshalb bauen wir nicht einfach nur Verpackungs­maschinen, sondern möchten Ihnen als Verpackungs­lösung ein zukunfts­sicheres, nachhaltiges Gesamtpaket bieten. Dafür nutzen wir unsere Kompetenz im Bereich Materialien, verknüpfen sie mit mehr als 50 Jahren Marktführerschaft in Verpackungs­technologie und sorgen auf Wunsch mit unseren Consulting-Experten dafür, dass die Verpackungs­lösung mit einem Höchstmaß an Effizienz in Ihre gesamte Prozess­kette eingegliedert ist.

01

Verpackungs­materialien

Mit der Wahl eines Materials und einer Verpackung entscheidet sich, wie effizient der Verpackungs­­prozess in der Maschine läuft. Deshalb haben wir für Sie in den letzten Jahren eine umfassende Expertise aufgebaut. Dazu gehört das Schubert Technikum, in dem wir die Maschinen­­gängigkeit von Verpackungen direkt in der Praxis testen und eine Vielzahl an marktüblichen Materialien bereits erprobt haben. So können unsere Experten Ihnen eine fundierte Empfehlung geben. Ebenfalls dazu gehört unsere Verpackungs­entwicklung für Karton, in der wir bestehende Verpackungen optimieren oder neue Alternativen zu Kunststoff­­verpackungen entwerfen.

MEHR ERFAHREN

02

Verpackungsmaschinen

Eine flexible Verpackungsmaschine lässt sich so gut modifizieren, dass sie 20 Jahre und mehr im Einsatz sein kann, selbst in schnelllebigen Branchen. Deshalb haben wir die Flexibilität in unser Top-Loading-Maschinenkonzept von Anfang an mit eingebaut: Die modulare Bauweise mit den hochentwickelten Schubert-Systemkomponenten ist durchgängig an die Anforderungen im Verpackungsbereich angepasst. Unsere ideal abgestimmte Robotertechnologie sorgt für Effizienz und Qualität im Verpackungsprozess, sei es beim Abfüllen oder Pick and Place, beim Verpacken in Schlauchbeutel oder in Schachteln. Nachhaltig, langlebig, flexibel – so sieht eine zukunftssichere Verpackungsmaschine heute aus.

ZU DEN VERPACKUNGSMASCHINEN

03

Technologie

Erst das optimale Zusammenspiel aller technologischen Komponenten in einer Anlage bringt Sie an Ihr Ziel, effizient und wirtschaftlich zu verpacken. Daher entwickeln wir fast jede Technologie bei Schubert selbst. Von unseren Robotern in Scala- und Deltabauweise über die Bildverarbeitung, den Transportroboter Transmodul, die fliegende Quersiegeleinheit für konstante Siegelzeiten, die Steuerung und die Werkzeuge bis zum Cobot. Aus der Schubert-Gruppe kommen weitere Komponenten wie das Industrial Gateway GS.Gate und die PARTBOX, das Gesamtsystem für 3D-gedruckte Formatteile in Ihrer Produktion.

ZUR TECHNOLOGIE
SERVICE, TURNKEY UND CONSULTING

Rund um die Verpackungslösungen bietet Schubert seinen Kunden eine Vielzahl an Dienstleistungen an. Als Generalunternehmer entwickeln, planen und realisieren wir Ihre Turnkey-Anlage herstellerunabhängig aus einer Hand. Oder Sie optimieren mit Schubert-Consulting Ihre Verpackungsprozesse entlang der gesamten Lieferkette. Und natürlich betreuen wir Ihre Schubert-Anlagen technisch und digital mit unserem umfassenden 4YOU Service-Portfolio über den gesamten Lebenszyklus hinweg.

Schubert-Consulting

Innovative Beratung

Als technischer Partner konzipieren wir systemische Lösungen für Ihre Verpackungs­vision. Wir begleiten Sie durch komplexe Planungs­abläufe – und sorgen dafür, dass Ihre Kunden Produkte höchster Qualität erhalten. Zu Beginn des Projekts erfolgt eine umfassende Beratung und Planung. Unser Konzept dient als Entscheidungs­grundlage für die interne Projekt­freigabe.

MEHR LADEN

Schubert Packaging Systems

Turnkey-Linien

Wir haben alle Verpackungs­prozesse im Blick. Basierend auf Ihrem Produkt und seinen Eigen­schaften entwickeln wir hochverfügbare Verpackungs­anlagen – aus optimal aufeinander abgestimmten Einzel­komponenten und -maschinen.

MEHR LADEN

Das 4YOU Service-Portfolio

Hochklassiger Service von Schubert – für Technologie und Menschen

Unser Service-Portfolio beinhaltet umfassende technische und digitale Service-Leistungen, die Sie und Ihre Produktion voranbringen. Von speziell auf die Maschine abgestimmten Service-Paketen über das Training Ihrer Mitarbeiter bis zur Prozessanalyse mithilfe digitaler Daten. Informieren Sie sich hier!

KARRIERE

SCHUBERT KARRIERE

Schubert ist nur so gut wie unsere Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter. Erst durch ihre Leidenschaft, ihre Kompetenz und ihre Beharrlichkeit sind wir in der Lage, bahnbrechende Technologien zu erschaffen, neue nachhaltige Lösungen zu finden und unseren Kunden die besten Verpackungsmaschinen der Welt zu bauen. An unseren Standorten bieten wir vielfältige Möglichkeiten für den Start in eine spannende Karriere. Jetzt informieren!

ZUR KARRIERE

MISSION BLUE

NACHHALTIGKEIT BEI SCHUBERT

Als Familienunternehmen in der dritten Generation ist nachhaltiges Denken Teil unserer DNA: Wir möchten den Menschen in unserem Umfeld eine lebenswerte Zukunft schaffen. Deshalb erarbeiten wir mit unserem Nachhaltigkeits­programm Mission Blue im Unternehmen und in der Produktion ganz konkrete Maßnahmen zum Klimaschutz. Gleichzeitig profitieren Sie als Kunde von unseren Bestrebungen, nachhaltige Maschinen und Verpackungs­lösungen zu entwickeln, mit denen Sie selbst umwelt­freundlicher produzieren können.

ZUR NACHHALTIGKEIT
TRENDS & NEWS
Schubert präsentiert zukunftssichere Verpackungslösungen auf der ProSweets Cologne 2025

Die Süßwaren- und Snackindustrie lebt von vielfältigen Sortimenten. Mit innovativen, nachhaltigen, flexiblen und damit zukunftssicheren Verpackungslösungen hilft Schubert Herstellern, schnell und einfach auf wechselnde Marktanforderungen zu reagieren. Auf der ProSweets Cologne 2025 können sich Besucher persönlich einen Eindruck von der Spitzentechnologie des Maschinenherstellers verschaffen. An Stand G031/F-030 in Halle 10.1 präsentiert das Unternehmen eine innovative Zuschnittzuführlösung für Kartonierer und informiert über ein neues Aufrichteaggregat mit Vertikalmagazin.

Wegweisende Scannertechnologie: Schubert baut Vision-Portfolio konsequent aus

Die Gerhard Schubert GmbH blickt auf vier Jahrzehnte technologischer Innovationen im Bereich der Bildverarbeitung zurück. Den Anfang der Pionierarbeit, die die Verpackungsbranche maßgeblich prägte, machte eine visionäre Kooperation mit dem Kernforschungszentrum Karlsruhe Mitte der achtziger Jahre. Vier Dekaden nach der Entwicklung des ersten Systems verfügt das Unternehmen über ein umfassendes Portfolio, das Schubert laufend erweitert. 2D- und 3D-Scanner wird künftig eine noch kompaktere Lösung ergänzen, die beide Technologien vereint.

An Stand G031/F-030 in Halle 10.1 präsentiert das Unternehmen eine innovative Zuschnittzuführlösung für Kartonierer und informiert über ein neues Aufrichteaggregat mit Vertikalmagazin.

Wegweisende Scannertechnologie: Schubert baut Vision-Portfolio konsequent aus

Die Gerhard Schubert GmbH blickt auf vier Jahrzehnte technologischer Innovationen im Bereich der Bildverarbeitung zurück. Den Anfang der Pionierarbeit, die die Verpackungsbranche maßgeblich prägte, machte eine visionäre Kooperation mit dem Kernforschungszentrum Karlsruhe Mitte der achtziger Jahre. Vier Dekaden nach der Entwicklung des ersten Systems verfügt das Unternehmen über ein umfassendes Portfolio, das Schubert laufend erweitert. 2D- und 3D-Scanner wird künftig eine noch kompaktere Lösung ergänzen, die beide Technologien vereint.

Schubert präsentiert zukunftssichere Verpackungslösungen auf der ProSweets Cologne 2025

Die Süßwaren- und Snackindustrie lebt von vielfältigen Sortimenten. Mit innovativen, nachhaltigen, flexiblen und damit zukunftssicheren Verpackungslösungen hilft Schubert Herstellern, schnell und einfach auf wechselnde Marktanforderungen zu reagieren. Auf der ProSweets Cologne 2025 können sich Besucher persönlich einen Eindruck von der Spitzentechnologie des Maschinenherstellers verschaffen. An Stand G031/F-030 in Halle 10.1 präsentiert das Unternehmen eine innovative Zuschnittzuführlösung für Kartonierer und informiert über ein neues Aufrichteaggregat mit Vertikalmagazin.
